name: Protecting Spirit Loagaeth
effectText: If this card on the field is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can target 1 monster on the field; it cannot be destroyed by battle this turn. You can only use each of the following effects of "Protecting Spirit Loagaeth" once per turn. If an effect of a Fairy monster you control is activated (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls and 1 Attack Position monster you control; banish that opponent's card, and if you do, change your monster to Defense Position.
